name: RAKUICHI Token
description: The Rakuza Project is a Japan-based initiative that issues phygital NFTs linked to actual anime cels and manga original drawings, and operates an NFT marketplace. Currently, it has expanded to include the operation of a DAO that supports phygital NFTs of works by Japanese creators and their NFT projects. Additionally, the project runs a gallery store displaying physical items linked to NFTs and participates in various events both in Japan and globally.
